definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: For all one knows that demon is simply the same instinct that makes a baby squall for attention.
sentences.chinese: 這種魔怪不外乎是嬰兒嚎啕以引起人注意的本能。

sentences.english: The outcome ranges between a total disaster and a terrible heart ache to wonderful love stories that are pure, genuine, emotional-fulfilling and highly sexual.
sentences.chinese: 結果不外乎就是災難心痛分手和靈慾合一的真愛之間。

sentences.english: That deep sigh could only express Helen's sadness.
sentences.chinese: 那深深的嘆息，不外乎表示出海倫的悲哀。

sentences.english: The reason of the illegal act includes the subjective and objective aspects.
sentences.chinese: 不法行爲產生的原因，不外乎主客觀兩方面。

sentences.english: What we are struggling for are nothing more than money and power (MP for short).
sentences.chinese: 我們的奮鬥，不外乎就是名利。

definition: not beyond the scope of/nothing more than
one of the given (options etc)/the first/firstly
generally speaking/by and large/for the most part
virtually the same/differing only on small points
